system.description:
A holy sword which grants special bonuses to lawful characters of classes which can cast clerical spells.

  • Save bonus: The wielder gains a +4 bonus to saves against magic.

  • Used against chaotic creatures: Inflicts double damage.

  • Used by other lawful characters: The sword functions as a +1 sword, without the other advantages described above.

  • Touched by a non-lawful character: The sword inflicts [[/r 1d6]] damage per round to neutral characters and [[/r 2d6]] per round to chaotic characters.
